title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Hiroshima,"  Front Side"
medium: Black and color marking pens; orange crayon; photocopy collaged to verso on heavy white tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black marking pen in margin below screen, right:  "Hiroshima"/8:16 Am (sic) August 6, 1945; in margin below screen, center:  [arrow pointing up]/Photograph; in margin lower left:  2. [encircled]
description: Four panel screen of differently shaped and colored panels.  From left to right:  blue panel with black wave pattern; green panel of black and white photo image with clock on top; two red and black panels with wood grain-like pattern with irregular top edge and triangle cut out at upper right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Hiroshima,"  Front Side".
Black and color marking pens; orange crayon; photocopy collaged to verso on heavy white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-116.
